desc: This method moves the read cursor in a channel.

channel.desc: Channel to set reading cursor in.

ts.desc: Timestamp of the most recently seen message.

errors.channel_not_found: Value passed for channel was invalid.
errors.invalid_timestamp: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.
errors.not_in_channel: Caller is not a member of the channel.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
